extendedInfo.description: Traffic Counter Extended is an easy way to monitor and count your Messages, Calls, Cell or Wifi- network usage.# Features- Cell (EDGE, 3G) and Wifi counter- SMS and Call counter- App traffic (if supported by device)- Beautiful widgets (1x1)- Display All/Month/Week/Today- Exclude numbers and timespans- Limit and usage notification- Statistics and Graphs- Billing/Cost calculation- Low energy usage- Light: just 300kbIf you like this free version, make sure to check out "Traffic Counter Pro" which comes with advanced features like 4x1 widget and backups.It's AD FREE! Please give me a COMMENT and RATE :) Thank you! Permissions:- READ_CONTACTS for call log- READ_SMS & RECEIVE_SMS for sms log- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE for backupslog mobile 3G counter net network stats usage

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: 99.5% accuracy compared to numbers my provider is giving me. Not 5/5 because counts got screwy when I changed time zones for some reason. May not work if you travel a lot. Plus for the customizable widget buttons!
reviews.author: Matthew Clearman

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: Units are shown as \"mb\".  Is that megabytes?  Megabits?  Powers of 2 or 10?  At a minimum either Mb, MB, or MiB should be used for clarity.  This is kinda important for an app designed to report metrics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Spyware
reviews.comment: App spys on contacts and emails, Eula says that info becomes his. Stay away!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to work on galaxy s2 now doesn\'t
reviews.comment: This was a great app before updating the os to ice cream sandwich. Since then it hssnt worked on my galaxy s2. Update required!

reviews.title: Time spans are annoying to set up
reviews.comment: If you have every day the same free hours you have to enter them one by one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Does it with style.  Five stars wishing there were fifteen XD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Simple, no ads, widgets included
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rogue App - DO NOT INSTALL
reviews.comment: Each time I ran the app it asked me to accept the EULA agreement, which I did initially, every time I ran it (uh?). I then continued. It placed an icon in the notification bar and sat there - forever, telling me it was \"updating\". Updating what? It certainly wasn\'t updating my traffic statistics all of which remained steadfastly at zero. As others suggest, this is now perhaps just spyware accessing your personal data. Perhaps the PRO version which you have to have for virtually any function other than the bare basics (perhaps even to have it count your data traffic - who knows) which the dev prods you toward all the time, gives you back your personal data and even a little bit of actual functionality - at a price? LOL. Tacky app. AVOID.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The most accurate and informative with good looking widgets. Hope it was totally free. Great job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: crap
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my Samsung galaxy mini , doesn\'t show usage on either cell or wifi , also tells me .I\'ve used 12 texts when I\'ve only used 2 .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great info. Accurate! The 3G does not work on Samsung galaxy P7500, but I know it is a kernel error. Spoke to to Samsung they said they are busy with the new kernel. This app is much better than 3G watcher. More Info showed. Especially which apps use how much data.  Great!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, falls just a little short by...
reviews.comment: Great app, love having the widgets for all four stats, cell, wifi, sms and minutes.  Pretty accurate too.  Would love to get the stats by app section NOT to reset when the phone reboots.  An option or something.  Emailed the developer several times to see if in the paid pro version, it would offer this, never got a response.  Too bad too, moved on to something else, would love to go back if this can be \"fixed.\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but just missing one thing...
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for a while now and it works great. The only thing I feel it needs is to show the data usage for applications, split between WiFi and everything else.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best trafic counter for Android
reviews.comment: Simply the best trafic counter there is for Android. Good pressentation of data (except for the surface diagram, should be a historiogram), exelent breakdown per app, seems accurate, nice widget.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is brilliant. I was using another one till it stoped working. I wish i\'d switched to this one sooner. So usfull! So easy to use!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great program.
reviews.comment: help me control my useage of calls and don\'t let the celular compenies lie to me on bills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to read display of data used on my home screen.
reviews.comment: A pity that the autor seems to have lost interest in Traffic Counter. It is a small app with very low system resources usage. It works perfectly well in the background, and in that it is unique among all cell data usage monitoring apps. There are fancier looking data apps out there, most of them being overloaded heavy pigs, which call back home frequently from the background and thus actually increasing data usage. Traffic counter uses only the permissions needed for it\'s operation, as far as I can see. Traffic Counter could benefit from a little interface update. If the autor could consider upgrading also to display the applications cell and wifi usage separately, I will gladly pay for a Pro version. Since Onava has been \"upgraded\" to be useless it is the right time now.    Peter Kroll, Singapore
reviews.author: Peter Kroll

reviews.title: Has stopped working!
reviews.comment: Was a great app but has stopped working after I have updated my galaxy s2 to ics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t count MMS messages, and it\'s logging of events is faulty and near impossible to read. Dev doesn\'t respond to emails. HTC Incredible S
